attributes.action: NHS to Prioritise HGV drivers who diagnose with sleep apnoea
attributes.additional_details: HGV driver's job is dangerous and DVLA revoked licence. So we need a system to allow us to get treatment sooner than expected.
attributes.background: I want the government order NHS and DVLA  to give priority for driver's who suffer from sleep apnoea

rejection.details: This is very much a clinical/operational decision - and there already exists advice within the NHS and DVLA about how to prioritise medical care for people with OSAS.
